metadata.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 6 (1996) - Proceedings of the Workshop on the Okhotsk Sea and Adjacent Areas / Workshop Co-convenors, Yutaka Nagata, Vyacheslav B. Lobanov, Lynne D. Talley
metadata.description:
This scientific report offers a collection of oral papers, posters abstracts and summary reports from eight sessions held under the following titles: A) Circulation and water mass structure of the Okhotsk Sea and northwestern Pacific, B) Sea ice and its relation to circulation and climate, C) Waves and tides, D) Physical oceanography of the Japan/East Sea, E) Communitites of the Okhotsk Sea and adjacent waters: composition, structure and dynamics, F) Abundance, distribution, dynamics of the common fishes of the Okhotsk Sea, G) Salmon of the Okhotsk Sea: biology, abundance, and stock identification, and H) Biodiversity of island ecosystems and seaside's of the North Pacific.

   [ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.6.  ISBN 0969842066 ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To report on the PICES Workshop on the Okhotsk Sea and Adjacent Areas held at the Pacific Academy of Management and Business in Vladivostok, Russia, on June 19-24, 1995.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned
